quotes.quote: It is better to suffer wrong than to do it, and happier to be sometimes cheated than not to trust.
In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing. The worst thing you can do is nothing.
A man in the wrong may more easily be convinced than one half right.
Nothing is right or wrong. It's all an interpretation of which lens we are looking through.
There are some ideas so wrong that only a very intelligent person could believe in them.
To persist in doing wrong extenuates not the wrong, but makes it much more heavy.
Standing up for whats wrong, is like intentional standing in line to be executed.
The wrong idea has taken root in the world. And the idea is this: there just might be lives out there that matter less than other lives.
The eternal difference between right and wrong does not fluctuate, it is immutable.
Right and wrong has never been obscure. It is as clear as the future.
When you see something that is wrong, there is something that has to be right.
There's nothing wrong with things taking time.
Never do a wrong thing to make a friend or to keep one.
Making a wrong decision is understandable. Refusing to search continually for learning is not.
Perhaps it is better to be irresponsible and right, than to be responsible and wrong.
The wrong step becomes the right step once you take it.
If you are going to do something wrong at least enjoy it.
Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
You are not just for the right or left, but for what is right over the wrong.
When you have the right, doesn't mean that you are right.
He who commits a wrong will himself inevitably see the writing on the wall, though the world may not count him guilty.
You can't do wrong right, but you can do right wrong.
To go beyond is as wrong as to fall short.
The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
To do a great right do a little wrong.
It is better to do the wrong thing that to do nothing.
One day he'll realize he is and was wrong. But that's for him to figure out. You can't change people or make them realize things they don't want to see.
It is wrong to assume that men of immense wealth are always happy.
A wrong-doer is often a man that has left something undone, not always he that has done something.
You got to go down a lot of wrong roads to find the right one.
